title.rendered: Streamline and Access Funding in Monaco

content.rendered:
Streamline and Access Funding in Monaco

In July 2020 we announced our partnership with the government of Monaco to support its effort to become a funding nation. You can register your interest and find out more information by filling out the form below.

Project Requirements

Have a social or environmental focus

Raise between €20-200 million in capital

Set up a subsidiary in Monaco

Obtain the Monaco STO visa

Benefits

Access investors

Streamline fundraising

Enable automation

Enforce compliance

“Monaco is moving towards its ambition to become a funding nation for progress with our STO framework. Two key milestones were achieved; a dedicated STO law was voted by the National Council and we are welcoming Tokeny to the Principality to operate our STOs.”

Disclaimer: Tokeny Solutions is not a registered broker-dealer, funding portal or financial advisor. Tokeny Solutions does not offer investment advice or analysis, nor do we endorse or recommend investments in any company discussed in this communication or on our website. To read our full disclosures please visit: https://tokeny.com/terms-of-use/.
